tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legislative_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_title VARCHAR(255),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_content TEXT,
    date_created TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Bills (
    bill_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    introduced_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Draft'
);

CREATE TABLE Resolutions (
    resolution_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    resolution_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    introduced_date DATE,
    content TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending'
);

CREATE TABLE Legislators (
    legislator_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    party VARCHAR(50),
    district VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Committees (
    committee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    committee_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    chairperson_id INT,
    description TEXT,
    formation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE bills (
    bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_name VARCHAR(255),
    bill_description TEXT,
    created_date DATE,
    last_modified_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
    resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resolution_title VARCHAR(255),
    resolution_text TEXT,
    resolution_status VARCHAR(50),
    sponsor_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE bill_versions (
    version_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_id INT,
    version_number VARCHAR(20),
    is_current_version BOOLEAN,
    version_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE resolutions_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resolution_id INT,
    action_date DATE,
    action_description TEXT,
    action_by VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE legislative_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    session_type VARCHAR(50)
)
